meanings.definition: A baked French dessert of fruit, typically cherries, covered with a thick batter.
meanings.sent1: I baked a delicious clafouti with cherries for dessert.
meanings.sent2: The clafouti at the bakery looked tempting with its cherry topping.
meanings.sent3: The clafouti was so tasty, it made me dance with joy.
meanings.sent4: Her clafouti was a burst of fruity delight in every bite.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the freshly baked clafouti filled the room.

meanings.definition: The dish made with this batter.
meanings.sent1: The clafouti was served warm and gooey, perfect for a cold day.
meanings.sent2: I couldn't resist a second helping of the delicious clafouti.
meanings.sent3: As a treat, she surprised us with a clafouti for breakfast.
meanings.sent4: The clafouti was a golden masterpiece of baked goodness.
meanings.sent5: The sweet clafouti melted in my mouth, leaving a fruity aftertaste.
